summary: German raider, using various disguises, forces British ship to surrender. Story told from German point of view.
cast: Van Heflin|Charles Laughton|Mylène Demongeot|John Ericson|Cecil Parker|Folco Lulli|Alex Nicol|Liam Redmond|Eleonora Rossi Drago|John Lee|Ralph Truman|Grégoire Aslan|Peter Carsten|Helmut Schmid|Gian Maria Volontè|Dieter Eppler|Edith Peters|Corrado Pani|Geronimo Meynier|Walter Barnes|Moira Orfei|Gérard Herter|Umberto Spadaro|Brendan Fitzgerald|Booth Colman|Philo Hauser|Joachim Luther|Graeme Bruce|Guido Celano|Giorgio Cerioni|Alain Dijon|James Dobson|Charles Nolte|Gregorio Wu
title: Bajo diez banderas
